Hero.competitionRegisterExplain: Click to apply to the competition

AboutEvent.title1: NVIDIA Studio Nights 6 returns as the premier creative competition spotlighting 3D/CGI, Interior Design, Short Films, Photography, and Digital Fashion.
AboutEvent.title2: This year, it takes place at Dubai's iconic Museum of the Future, a landmark setting for innovation and artistry. The event brings together professionals and newcomers alike, fostering collaboration, inspiration, and community in the digital arts. Whether competing or attending, participants will experience cutting-edge creativity and witness the future of design unfold with NVIDIA Studio.

AboutCompetition.title: About the competition
AboutCompetition.desc: Competitors will showcase their talents across five categories, with the grand prize being a cutting-edge GeForce RTX™ 50 series product. Winners will share the stories behind their creations, revealing the inspirations, tools, and technologies that shaped their work. Audiences will gain insight into how NVIDIA’s innovations drive artistic expression, while winners walk away with hardware built to power their future masterpieces.

Prizes.title: Prizes
Prizes.desc: Each category winner—3D/CGI, Photography, Interior Design, Short Films & Videography, and Digital Fashion Design—will be awarded a coveted trophy and powerful GeForce RTX 50 Series products. Their achievements will also be celebrated with a dedicated feature on our social media platforms, shining a spotlight on their talent and creativity.

Categories.title: Categories
Categories.cgiDesc: Submit a short video with your source file to enter. One winner will be chosen to bring their creation to life during the event, editing, rendering, or showcasing their work live.
Categories.photographyDesc: Share a short video along with your source file for a chance to win. The selected photographer will refine and present their visuals at the event, demonstrating their creative process in real time.
Categories.fashionDesc: Submit your fashion-forward design to compete for the Best Design award, chosen by audience vote. Your work will be displayed on a mannequin at the event, turning creativity into a statement piece.
Categories.interiorDesc: Present your interior design project and see it transformed at the event. Selected works will be reimagined as immersive walkthrough videos, allowing audiences to experience your vision in motion.
Categories.videographyDesc: Share your short film or videography project for a chance to be featured on the big screen. The winning entry will captivate audiences during the event, showcasing your story and vision in full cinematic form.

terms.title: NVIDIA STUDIO NIGHTS 6
important_notes: Winners will be contacted via phone or email from 8 April 2025 to 10 April 2025.

Winners and shortlisted participants (for NVIDIA Canvas Art) agree to attend the event at the Grand Egyptian Museum, present their project, and share their experiences during a pre-event briefing session with NVIDIA.
terms.eligibility: The competition is open to residents of the Middle East who are aged 18 years or older.
event_details: Event Time: 6:00 pm to 9:30 pm EET.

entry_submission.multiple_entries: If the same person submits multiple entries, only the latest entry will be considered, and earlier entries will be discarded.
entry_submission.deadline: The deadline for entry submissions is 7 April 2025. Late entries will not be accepted.
entry_submission.content_restrictions: Furthermore, entrants must ensure their content does not violate legal regulations or third-party rights. The organizer reserves the right to delete entries as the situation requires. This is especially true for entries that include:
prohibited_content: Degrading, abusive, insulting, radical, or violent language
entry_submission.disqualification: The Organizer reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to reject entries from users who fail to comply with these rules or to disqualify any individual found tampering with the entry process or the operation of the raffle, or acting in violation of these terms and conditions.
entry_submission.usage_rights: By participating in this contest, entrants grant NVIDIA and its affiliates the non-exclusive, royalty-free right to use, reproduce, display, and distribute the submitted artwork in press releases, social media posts, promotional materials, and other forms of communication-related to Studio Nights 6. This includes, but is not limited to: showcasing the artwork during the event, featuring it in post-event media coverage, and utilizing it in future promotional campaigns. Entrants retain ownership of their artwork but acknowledge that their submissions may be publicly displayed and used by NVIDIA for promotional purposes without further compensation.

prizes.description: Prizes include a GeForce RTX Laptop and an official NVIDIA trophy. Winners' works will be showcased at the NVIDIA Studio Nights 6 event, and their projects and names will be featured in post-event content published in major MENA media outlets.
conditions: Prizes cannot be exchanged for cash, other alternatives, or credits.
They are non-transferable and non-redeemable for cash or credit, either fully or partially.
Prizes are subject to availability, and the organizer reserves the right to substitute any prize with another of equivalent value without prior notice.
Winners are responsible for any tax liability incurred through participating in the competition and receiving their prize.

terms.general_liability: The organizer assumes no liability for fraudulent calls or emails that entrants may receive from third parties.

digital_art_canvas.title: Digital Art Canvas
description: Create your art using NVIDIA Canvas, share a screenshot of your sketch and outcome, and your final art (high resolution).
Sketches and final artwork of the top 10 participants will be printed and presented at the event.
The event audience, community, and attendees will vote for their favorite artwork prior to the event. During the event, the artist with the most votes will be selected as the winner.
conditions: Ten (10) entries will be shortlisted for the event, and one (1) winner will be chosen by voting during the event itself, from all entries received and verified by the organizer.
If you are shortlisted and selected among the top 10, you must be present at the event and present your work.

entry_submission.instruction: All art must be created using NVIDIA Canvas software. [Free download here]
entry_submission.screenshot: A screenshot of the initial sketch and the generated artwork must be submitted in the same zipped folder. Refer to the image below for guidance.
entry_submission.filename: The filename of the zipped folder should be: Category_Firstname Lastname_TitleofArt.
entry_submission.zip_instruction: Both files (the screenshot and the artwork) should be placed inside a zip folder, following the filename format above.

videography.title: Videography / Film Direction
videography.description: Create and submit an unedited short video along with the project source file. The winner in this category will be given a unique opportunity to edit and render their content live during the event.
videography.winner_selection: One winner will be chosen for the Videography category and contacted by the organizers.

entry_requirements.instruction: All videos must be created using an RTX PC or Laptop.
entry_requirements.submission: Submit both the project (source) file and the unedited short video, zipped into a single folder.
entry_requirements.filename: Filename for the zipped folder: Category_Firstname Lastname_TitleofArt.
entry_requirements.zip_instruction: Place both files (the project/source file and the unedited video) inside a zip folder, following the filename format above.

fashion.title: Digital Fashion Designer
fashion.description: Create your next piece of clothing or accessory, and add the final touches to your design live during the event.
fashion.winner_selection: One winner will be chosen for the fashion category and contacted by the organizers.

entry_requirements.instruction: All fashion pieces must be created using an RTX PC or Laptop.
entry_requirements.submission: Submit both the source/project file and the final video, zipped into a single folder.
entry_requirements.filename: Filename for the zipped folder: Category_Firstname Lastname_TitleofArt.
entry_requirements.zip_instruction: Place both files (the source/project file and the final video) inside a zip folder, following the filename format above.

architecture.title: Architects
architecture.description: Create your next architectural design—whether it's an exterior or interior concept—and add the final touches live during the event.
architecture.winner_selection: One winner will be chosen for the architecture category and contacted by the organizers.

entry_requirements.instruction: All architectural designs must be created using an RTX PC or Laptop.
entry_requirements.submission: Submit both the source/project file and the final video, zipped into a single folder.
entry_requirements.filename: Filename for the zipped folder: Category_Firstname Lastname_TitleofArt.
entry_requirements.zip_instruction: Place both files (the source/project file and the final video) inside a zip folder, following the filename format above.

cgi.title: CGI / 3D Art
cgi.description: Create and share a CGI project along with your video, or design a car, iconic building, character, or any 3D object. The winner in this category will get the chance to edit their content live during the event.
cgi.winner_selection: One winner will be chosen for the CGI/3D category and contacted by the organizers.

entry_requirements.instruction: All CGI artwork must be created using an RTX PC or Laptop.
entry_requirements.submission: Submit both the source/project file and the final video, zipped into a single folder.
entry_requirements.filename: Filename for the zipped folder: Category_Firstname Lastname_TitleofArt.
entry_requirements.zip_instruction: Place both files (the source/project file and the final video) inside a zip folder, following the filename format above.

game_dev.title: Game Development
game_dev.description: Create and showcase a demo of a video game concept, and get to walk through your title live at the event.
game_dev.winner_selection: One winner will be chosen for the game development category and contacted by the organizers.

entry_requirements.instruction: All game development projects must be created using an RTX PC or Laptop.
entry_requirements.submission: Submit both the source/project file and the final video, zipped into a single folder.
entry_requirements.filename: Filename for the zipped folder: Category_Firstname Lastname_TitleofArt.
entry_requirements.zip_instruction: Place both files (the source/project file and the final video) inside a zip folder, following the filename format above.
